plot: 5 people trapped in a 1960's nuclear shelter after a nuclear and biological attack in Australia and beyond. As food and water runs out they are forced to make an impossible decision - either one dies or they all die.
title: 54 Days
plot_es: 5 people trapped in a 1960's nuclear shelter after a nuclear and biological attack in Australia and beyond. As food and water runs out they are forced to make an impossible decision - either one dies or they all die.
